  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_7886c040243ff3a69ddcb97c929c7bd6988e6372</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_7886c040243ff3a69ddcb97c929c7bd6988e6372</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Forces: friction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte: Friktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces : frottement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças: fricção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze: attrito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις: τριβή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas: fricción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the force of friction acting on a crate being pulled across the floor (top) and a crate sliding down a ramp (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pull</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sliding friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen die Kraft der Friktion 
fungierend auf einem Rahmen, der über den Fußboden (Oberseite) 
gezogen werden und einem Rahmen, der hinunter eine Rampe (Unterseite) 
schiebt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent la force du frottement
agissant sur une caisse étant tirée à travers le plancher (dessus) 
et une caisse glissant en bas d'une rampe (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram a força da fricção
que age em um crate que estão sendo puxados através do assoalho 
(alto) e em um crate que desliza abaixo uma rampa (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano la forza di attrito
che si comporta su una cassa che sono tirate attraverso il pavimento 
(parte superiore) e su una cassa che fa scorrere giù un dilagare 
(parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν τη δύναμη της τριβής
ενεργώντας σε ένα κλουβί που τραβιούνται πέρα από το πάτωμα 
(κορυφή) και ένα κλουβί που γλιστρά κάτω από μια κεκλιμένη 
ράμπα (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran la fuerza de la 
fricción que actúa en un cajón que es tirado a través del suelo 
(tapa) y un cajón que resbala abajo de una rampa (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zug</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schieben von von Friktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">glissement du frottement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">forças</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslizando a fricção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tiro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fare scorrere attrito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δυνάμεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τράβηγμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τριβή ολίσθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerzas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tirón</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resbalar la fricción</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
